fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Food Safety

1. Animal Feed Legislation 
2. Animal By Products Legislation 
3. Feed Additives authorisation 
4. Environmental initiatives (BREF etc)

6. Companion Animal Welfare 
7. Common Agricultural Policy 
8. Trade discussions
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: PFMA works with our European Trade Association (FEDIAF) firstly to shape our policy position on these issues. Once a position has been adopted we make contact with our relevant national authority in the UK to put forward our agreed position.
goals__remit: The PFMA is the leading trade body for the UK pet food industry and our 70 members account for over 90% of the market. PFMA aims to create a credible and responsible industry by placing pets at the centre of everything we do.  While striving to achieve a balanced regulatory environment for the production of nutritious and safe food, PFMA also encourages responsible pet ownership, working in partnership with relevant pet bodies. It aims to be the main resource for its members, the public and others, as well as playing a lead role in forming opinions in Europe through the European Pet Food Federation (FEDIAF).
